Room.Name: Melbourne Avenue/Waterfront Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Waterfront Way and Melbourne Avenue.
Room.LongDescription: Melbourne Avenue runs north from Waterfront Way, heading past the infamous Melbourne Entertainment Arena, where criminals and other less appreciated members of society are put to their deaths by throwing them into the arena to be stones, skewered or otherwise mutilated in a horrible death. This tends to keep crime in the city down, though.
